  • Constructor Details

    • Alert

      public Alert(android.content.Context context, android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter bluetoothAdapter, MainActivity mainActivity)
      Constructor to initialize the Alert class with the given context and Bluetooth adapter.
      Parameters:
      context - The application context
      bluetoothAdapter - The Bluetooth adapter for managing connections
      mainActivity - The main activity for updating the UI

  • Method Details

    • connectAlert

      public void connectAlert()
      It initiates the connection to the alert sensor device using its MAC address. If the device is found, it attempts to connect and discover its services.

    • checkAndDiscoverServices

      private void checkAndDiscoverServices(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt)
      Checks if the necessary permissions are granted and discovers services for the GATT device.
      Parameters:
      gatt - The Bluetooth GATT object

    • closeConnection

      private void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection to the Bluetooth GATT device and cleans up resources.

    • setupCharacteristicNotification

      private void setupCharacteristicNotification(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt)
      Sets up characteristic notifications for the alert button.
      Parameters:
      gatt - The Bluetooth GATT object

    • handleCharacteristicData

      private void handleCharacteristicData(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      It Handles the data received from the characteristic and updates the UI if an alert is pressed.
      Parameters:
      characteristic - The Bluetooth GATT characteristic containing the alert data
